name: PAUSE
description:
PAUSE, The [Perl programming] Authors Upload Server, has few pages ("Show my files", "Delete files", "Force reindex") which list the author's files. That lists are… to spartan. This style makes the file lists readable:

* Files are grouped to releases.
* Releases are grouped to distributions.
* Distributions have headings.
* Non-tarball files are grey.
* Tarball files are black.
* Trial releases are blue.
* Files scheduled for deletion are red.
